forum.name: suggestions
forum.description: got a new feature idea for anyland, or anything that could be improved?
forum.latestCommentText: i wonder if the game can actually handle that many script lines.

thread.title: parent player to object

comments.text: it would be really cool if you could parent a player to an object. could be used to make stuff like vehicles, eva suits and other locomotion utilities.
i really want to be able to customize a player's locomotion, perhaps prompting them of the change beforehand, particularly for those sensitive to motion sickness and to avoid grief
im building a space station and thought it would be cool if visitors could put on a space pack that allowed for freeform movement and grab&pull mechanics
we have that it's ridables. on the backside of the subthing menu there is a button push it once to switch to placed subthings
nothing free form though. all sripted
how do i create a rideable? i cant find any such option in the menus you mentioned...
when you context-laser a part during creation, there will be a bottom-right icon to the sub-things dialog -- turn that dialog around and switch to the placed sub-things menu, ...
... which when it moves can take people who teleported onto it with them (like for elevators and such). not the full vehicles update, though that is something we want too! thx

thread.latestCommentText: ... which when it moves can take people who teleported onto it with them (like for elevators and such). not the full vehicles update, though that is something we want too! thx
